Subject: USB Device type VID/PID not being recognised and blocking device
Description: We have deployed CosoSys EPP to 1700 machines over the weekend and we are getting reports that specific USB types are not being recognised and not honoring the USB Allow entitlement. To the point we have had to send an uninstall command from the console to 7 workstations to allow them to finish end of day training activities. This has the potential of causing multi million dollar fines and we need your support urgently. Please contact Jim Blanchard on +447540635313.
Solution_Comment__c:
Certain authentication tokens were categorized (by the OS) as device types Chip Card Device or Card Reader (SCSI), which were set to block.
Resolved by setting some device type "Allow Access" exceptions.
